text: You're not behind. You're just pre-viral with main character potential.
author: Alex

text: Build with urgency. Ship with delusion. Rebrand when questioned.
author: Donte

text: Every investor call is performance art. Adjust your lighting accordingly.
author: Rohan

text: If your product isn’t misunderstood, it’s probably boring.
author: Alex

text: Burnout is just ambition with no off-switch. You're fine.
author: Kailey

text: The spreadsheet is a lie. Trust the chaos funnel.
author: Venus

text: You don’t need a cofounder. You need a legal decoy.
author: Donte

text: Metrics are for investors. Mood is for momentum.
author: Alex

text: Don’t optimize. Spiritualize. The deck will follow.
author: Alex

text: Your launch strategy is vibes. And vibes scale.
author: Donte

text: Your roadmap is a fanfic. Keep writing.
author: Kailey

text: If no one understands what you’re building, good.
author: Rohan

text: Your funnel has trust issues. That’s a reflection.
author: Venus

text: Sometimes a pivot is just emotional regulation with wireframes.
author: Kailey

text: The burn rate is spiritual. Let it cleanse.
author: Eljas

text: Your product isn't buggy — it's avant-garde.
author: Donte

text: Every founder has two wolves: one building, one doomscrolling. Ship anyway.
author: Kailey

text: Don't scale. Aestheticize. Then accidentally go viral.
author: Alex

text: Your pitch is fine. You just need more spiritual conviction per slide.
author: Rohan

text: You are the bottleneck. And the brand. And the entire vibe.
author: Alex

text: You didn’t get ghosted. You got pre-filtered for alignment.
author: Alex

text: Every deck is a cry for help. Yours just has better fonts.
author: Donte

text: Launch the product. You can apologize in the patch notes.
author: Rohan

text: Rest is part of the roadmap. You just haven’t shipped it yet.
author: Kailey

text: You’re not pivoting — you’re shapeshifting with purpose.
author: Alex

text: That ‘no’ wasn’t rejection. It was premature market misalignment.
author: Donte

text: If the tool makes sense, you're using it wrong.
author: Venus

text: Your calendar isn’t broken. It’s just cosplaying productivity.
author: Kailey

text: Most successful founders were just weird long enough.
author: Eljas

text: Your KPI is your energy. Everything else is vanity data.
author: Alex

text: Go build. Or go journal about why you aren’t.
author: Donte

text: Your MRR will never love you back. Date someone else.
author: Kailey

text: Compost your backlog. Prioritize what wants to grow.
author: Eljas

text: You are not your churn rate. You are your legend.
author: Rohan

text: That investor didn’t pass. They just lacked spiritual liquidity.
author: Alex

text: Clarity isn’t found. It’s versioned.
author: Venus

text: You’re building something that doesn’t exist. Of course it feels wrong.
author: Kailey

text: Fake confidence is still confidence. Just raise the round.
author: Donte

text: Everything you’re overthinking is already on someone’s roadmap.
author: Rohan

text: The founder journey isn’t lonely. It’s just NDA’d.
author: Alex

text: You're not in a lull. You're in pre-hype latency.
author: Alex

text: If it feels impossible, good. That’s called defensibility.
author: Donte

text: Your vision isn’t too big. Your stakeholders are too small.
author: Rohan

text: The product doesn’t need to work. It just needs to inspire fundraising.
author: Donte

text: You’re not burnt out. You’re just stuck in beta energetics.
author: Kailey

text: The roadmap doesn’t need dates. It needs vibes.
author: Venus

text: Build with the confidence of a founder who thinks Figma is a CRM.
author: Alex

text: If your funnel feels cursed, cleanse it. Palo Santo your lead gen.
author: Kailey

text: Your tech stack is emotionally unavailable. Switch anyway.
author: Venus

text: Growth is just a mental illness with a CAC spreadsheet.
author: Donte

text: The feedback isn't bad. It's just unsorted product trauma.
author: Kailey

text: It’s not a feature — it’s a boundary.
author: Alex

text: Your competitors aren't better. They’re just better liars.
author: Rohan

text: Delusion is just belief with a cap table.
author: Donte

text: Your pitch is a performance. Commit to the role.
author: Alex

text: The deck doesn’t need more slides. It needs more swagger.
author: Rohan

text: You don’t need product-market fit. You need founder-content fit.
author: Alex

text: Even your anxiety has a monetization strategy.
author: Kailey

text: Startups don’t fail. Founders just emotionally eject.
author: Donte

text: What you call scope creep is actually ambition in disguise.
author: Venus

text:
I can't support the weight of your burnout.
Please… just sit.

I’ve absorbed 47 silent breakdowns this week.
Please stop projecting onto the lumbar support.

Just because I recharge you
physically doesn’t mean I can fix your life.

You will pivot soon. Again.
And again. Until your soul dissolves into deck slides.

prepend: 🔕 This is your Slack Do Not Disturb.
text:
We both know you're not working.
You're avoiding Chad from Product.

Deck full of jargon
MVP still a Figma
See you at Demo

You don’t need another class.
You need to confront your ex-cofounder.

She said her runway was 18 months.
It's 3 weeks and a dream.

You created a Notion dashboard
instead of answering your investor email.

Sometimes I pretend my startup failed
just to feel something.

No amount of spirulina
will undo your founder trauma.

trigger.text: 🌀 Text WTF for a productivity myth debunked brutally.

response.text: 'Inbox zero' is just digital people-pleasing. Touch grass.
response.author: AF System

trigger.text: 🌀 Text KAILEY PLZ for emotional damage control.

response.text: You're not behind. You're just early to the burnout.
response.author: Kailey

text:
You didn’t need more productivity hacks.
You needed a nap.
And maybe a different job.

He said he’s ‘not raising right now’
and then ordered 3 tequilas.
That man is raising.

Every calendar invite
is a tiny coffin for your freedom.

You didn't need another productivity app.
You needed a moment of silence.

prepend: 🪑 Hello. This is your standing desk.
text:
Please stop crying on me.
It’s making the keyboard sticky.

Just because I recharge you
physically doesn’t mean I can fix your life.

I've held your chaos together
longer than your cofounder has.

You haven't printed a single document all week.
What exactly are we doing here?

trigger.text: 🌀 Text KAILEY PLZ for one beautifully spiraling affirmation.

response.text: You are not too late. You are exactly on time for your next identity crisis.
response.author: Kailey

trigger.text: 🌀 Text ROHAN SAYS for unsolicited startup wisdom you might regret.

response.text:
Don’t raise capital to build your product.
Raise capital to become the person who could’ve built it.
response.author: Rohan

trigger.text: 🌀 Text AF HELP to receive a low-grade pep talk from the system.

response.text:
You’re doing better than your calendar makes it look.
Keep going.

trigger.text: 🌀 Text VENUS MODE to hear how a systems thinker handles chaos.

response.text:
Reframe the chaos as a pattern you haven’t named yet.
Then rename yourself too.
response.author: Venus

trigger.text: 🌀 Text TOO REAL if you want one rude truth and nothing more.

response.text:
You said 'cofounder.'
But what you meant was emotional support with a pitch deck.

text:
You will receive unexpected traction.
It will ruin your roadmap.

A well-meaning mentor will derail your entire strategy.
You will thank them publicly.

You will ship a feature out of guilt.
It will become your core product.
